article_title: How Obamacare Lowers The Price Of Your Car Insurance

article_metadata.description: The cost of automobile insurance, workers’ compensation coverage and general business liability insurance could drop by as much as 5% thanks to the Affordable Care Act, according to a new study. Though the health law doesn’t cover cars or workers compensation, new analysis by RAND Corporation indicates it may help car [...]
